Module io.helidon.media.jackson
Package io.helidon.media.jackson

Class JacksonSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.media.jackson.JacksonSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaSupport
    public final class JacksonSupport
extends Object
implements MediaSupport
    Support for Jackson integration. For usage examples navigate to the MediaSupport.
